publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4562 Charlie Gordon: Happy Anniversary to Castlemilk Law and Money Advice Centreâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Castlemilk Law and Money Advice Centre on its 30th anniversary and acknowledges the outstanding knowledge and experience of its highly committed lawyers and advisors, which is at the service of the people of Castlemilk. Supported by: Anne McLaughlin, Ken Macintosh*, Pauline McNeill*, John Wilson*, Robert Brown*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Paul Martin*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Helen Eadie*, David Stewart*, David Whitton*
